verses.text: \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* measuring line \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* hand.

“\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* going?” \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w To|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* determine \w its|strong="H7161"\w* width \w and|strong="H3063"\w* length.”

\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* angel \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* speaking \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* forth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w* angel \w came|strong="H3068"\w* forward \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “Run \w and|strong="H3063"\w* tell \w that|strong="H1471"\w* young \w man|strong="H5375"\w*: ‘Jerusalem \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* city \w without|strong="H3808"\w* walls because \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* livestock \w within|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall \w of|strong="H3027"\w* fire \w around|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, declares \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* glory within \w it|strong="H7200"\w*.’”

“\w Get|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*! \w Get|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*! Flee \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* north,” declares \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* scattered \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* four winds \w of|strong="H7341"\w* heaven,” declares \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w Get|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H3318"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Zion! \w Escape|strong="H3318"\w*, \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* dwell \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Daughter \w of|strong="H4397"\w* Babylon!”

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3389"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Hosts \w says|strong="H1696"\w*: “After \w His|strong="H8432"\w* Glory \w has|strong="H1696"\w* sent \w Me|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* nations \w that|strong="H5288"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* plundered \w you|strong="H8432"\w*—\w for|strong="H3427"\w* whoever touches \w you|strong="H8432"\w* touches \w the|strong="H8432"\w* apple \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w His|strong="H8432"\w* eye—

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H1961"\w* wave \w My|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* plunder \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* servants. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Hosts \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H3068"\w* \w Me|strong="H1961"\w*.”

“Shout \w for|strong="H3588"\w* joy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Daughter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6566"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* coming \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dwell among \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w On|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* day many nations \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w join|strong="H3427"\w* themselves \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* they \w will|strong="H1323"\w* become \w My|strong="H4422"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*. I \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* know \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Hosts \w has|strong="H6726"\w* sent Me \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H7997"\w* possession \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Holy Land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* once \w again|strong="H7971"\w* choose \w Jerusalem|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* silent \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H3045"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* roused \w Himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* holy dwelling.”
